channel.title: [Class suggestion] Doppleganger/Mimic
channel.description:
Doppleganger - Blue dragon Support Passive: Calling card - You know when you get this passive
Day ability: Duplicate- You will copy your target. The next night your invest results will be the same as your target (Unlimited)
Night ability 1: Utilize - You will use the first night ability of the person you copied. If that ability is a conversion you will use the second ability instead. You will always select 2 targets. If the ability only targets 1 person it will be the one on the left. You will not know what you did nor will you get invest results. If the action failed you will know (that means if it hit an immune) (4 uses) Night ability 2: Copy - You will gain the passives of the copied player until the next night unless the player is merc. If it gives you occ immunity then that will stop people trying to occupy you this night(Unlimited)
Mimic - Unseen support
Day ability: Replicate- You will copy your target. You cannot target unseen members. (Unlimited)
Night ability 1: Activate - You will use the first night ability of the person you copied. You cannot use 2 target abilitys or abilitys that directly attack. If you would you instead use the other ability. You receive any feedback the ability would give you. If the ability fails you will know(3 uses) Night ability 2: Copy - You will gain the passives of the copied player until the next night unless the player is merc. If it gives you occ immunity then that will stop people trying to occupy you this night(Unlimited)

item.title: [Class suggestion] Doppleganger/Mimic

item.description:
Doppleganger - Blue dragon Support
Passive: Calling card - You know when you get this passive

Day ability: Duplicate- You will copy your target. The next night your invest results will be the same as your target (Unlimited)

Night ability 1: Utilize - You will use the first night ability of the person you copied. If that ability is a conversion you will use the second ability instead. You will always select 2 targets. If the ability only targets 1 person it will be the one on the left. You will not know what you did nor will you get invest results. If the action failed you will know (that means if it hit an immune) (4 uses)
Night ability 2: Copy - You will gain the passives of the copied player until the next night unless the player is merc. If it gives you occ immunity then that will stop people trying to occupy you this night(Unlimited)

Mimic - Unseen support

Day ability: Replicate- You will copy your target. You cannot target unseen members. (Unlimited)

Night ability 1: Activate - You will use the first night ability of the person you copied. You cannot use 2 target abilitys or abilitys that directly attack. If you would you instead use the other ability. You receive any feedback the ability would give you. If the ability fails you will know(3 uses)
Night ability 2: Copy - You will gain the passives of the copied player until the next night unless the player is merc. If it gives you occ immunity then that will stop people trying to occupy you this night(Unlimited)
